name: SXZ Pixel Bringer [ Style ]
description:
All the content I make is and will be completely free on CivitAI.
But if you want to support me with a coin, then you can do it here.

Trained on AbyssOrangeMix2 with clip skip 2.

Recommended embeddings:
1. easynegative
2. bad-hands-5

Recommended extension:
1. Pixelization

Strength 1 - 0.6 is optimal.

PLEASE CHECK YOUR LORA NAME AFTER DOWNLOAD.

There is no trigger word, but i highly recommend to use tag pixel art in the end of your prompt.

If you want a full body sprite image, then you should go with this structure: full body of CHARACTER, very detailed, realistic, simple background, transparent background, pixel art

This lora is resolution and hires.fix friendly, so feel free to experiment and share your feedback. Enjoy!
